name: Terbium Source Code File
summary: Learn about .TRB files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Terbium is a simple programming language developed by GitHub users jay3332 and Cryptex-github. According to the language's GitHub page, it is "performant yet elegant and feature-packed." It includes features inspired by both Rust and TypeScript.
Developers save Terbium source code as TRB files. These files can be analyzed using terbium_analyzer, tokenized using terbium_grammar, and interpreted and evaluated using terbium_interpreter.

instructions: You can open and edit a TRB file in any text or source code editor, such as Microsoft Visual Studio Code or GitHub Atom. Source code editors, like VS Code and Atom, contain helpful tools that make reading and editing TRB files easier.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
